# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  inductor.cir ErrorMessageTest.cir ErrorMessageTest.cir.sh ErrorMessageTest.cir.tags tags ErrorMessageTest.cir.options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ErrorMessageTest.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/ErrorMessageTest.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} ErrorMessageTest.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ErrorMessageTest.cir ${OutputDataDir}/INDUCTOR/ErrorMessageTest.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/ErrorMessageTest.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;inductor;errorexit")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/ErrorMessageTest.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} ErrorMessageTest.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ErrorMessageTest.cir ${OutputDataDir}/INDUCTOR/ErrorMessageTest.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/ErrorMessageTest.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;inductor;errorexit")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/inductor.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> inductor.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/inductor.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;inductor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/inductor.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP inductor.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/inductor.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} inductor.cir ${OutputDataDir}/INDUCTOR/inductor.cir.prn inductor.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/inductor.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED inductor.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}INDUCTOR/inductor.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;inductor")
endif()
